name: ActiveStandards
overview:
ActiveStandards offers a web quality management platform as Software-as-a-Service. Designed specifically for global organizations having a distributed web presence, ActiveStandards allows organizations to insure consistent quality across their websites while enabling individual groups to maintain editorial autonomy.

The service was developed for organizations having web and branding standards, but frustrated with their inability to monitor them across a massive internet presence.

More information can be found here: http://actvestandards.com

Key customers include Unilever, Shell, Alcatel-Lucent, CSC, BNP Paribas, RBS, Rolls-Royce, KLM Royal Dutch Airlines, Philips and others.
